name: sqlselect
description: SQL SELECT query tool for configured data sources (CSV, Parquet, JSON)

sales.description: Sales data with customer and product details

source_name.description: Name of the data source (required for describe_source, sample_data, get_schema, count_rows)

query.description: SQL SELECT query to execute (required for execute_query)

where_clause.description: WHERE clause for filtering (optional for count_rows)

limit.description: Maximum number of rows to return
